text: The footer should be within the body tag
Then have the svg as a direct child of the body and give it `position:absolute;bottom:0;`
so i know HubSpot now includes the option to load jQuery in the footer (which is awesome)… but is there anyway to have this option enabled in a staging area but not on the live domain?
Yes, if you have the :chrome: <#CBBAW6Z3R|community-browser-extension> click the “footer jquery button” <https://spin.d.pr/3tNcri>
